notes.title: Data availability
notes.p:
Data for the ROSMAP
37 and Mayo cohorts
40 are available through the AMP-AD Knowledge Portal
31 . Data for the MSSM-Penn-Pitt and HBCC cohorts are available through the CommonMind Knowledge Portal
23 .

eQTL results for the ROSMAP
78 , Mayo TCX
79 , Mayo CER
80 and cortical meta-analysis
81 are available through the AMP-AD Knowledge Portal. These results include SNP (location, rsid, alleles, and allele frequency) and gene (location, gene symbol, strand and biotype) information, as well as estimated effect size (beta), statistic (z), p-value, FDR, and expression-increasing allele.
